item.title: Windows Repository for Offline Appliance Updates
item.description: To take advantage of the new features that vRA 6.2 has to offer, itâ€™s time to upgrade. The upgrade will make it easier to transition from the vCAC branding to vRA. This was also a good time to start thinking about how to go about the process.
